name: Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Blue Lagoon

reviews.title: Friendly place
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights and basically this is a friendly place.

reviews.title: lik home away from home
reviews.text: People working here are very nice and try to help. We were given a huge room with 2 beds without extra charge. Unfortunately the room was robbed by the previous occupant and we had almost nothing left but the hotel staff were nice to get us every thing we asked for: blankets, saucer pans, knives and forks, clock, remote control, etc. But I think the management should be more strict in checking the room amanities to make sure every thing is there.

reviews.title: Homestead - Great place to stay!
reviews.text: In 2002 we spent close to 5 days there,we had a great time.The rooms were clean and the service good.The shuttle driver and the desk employer were more than helpful.We will definitely stay there again.
